
delete-identity
***************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Deletes the specified identity (email address or domain) from the list
of verified identities.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws ses delete-identity
     --identity <value>


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--identity"  (string)
   The identity to be removed from the list of identities for the AWS
   Account.


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
